alert.note: Alert for Washington (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 8:17AM PST until December 29 at 7:24PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Oregon... Marys River near Philomath affecting Benton County. Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon...Washington... Tualatin River near Dilley affecting Washington County. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Clatsop and Tillamook Counties. Grays River near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Tualatin River near Dilley. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...Above 18.5 feet, a few homes are threatened by floodwaters. Numerous roads are flooded and may be closed, and widespread lowland agricultural flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM PST Wednesday the stage was 18.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 AM PST Wednesday was 18.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain around 18.0 through this afternoon and then gradually fall Wednesday night. It is forecast to drop below flood stage Thursday morning and then remain around 17.3 feet through Friday. - Flood stage is 17.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Don`t drive around road closure barricades or into flooded areas. Find another route. Additional information is available at weather.gov/portland. The next statement will be issued by 4 pm PST today.
